skillTree.name: Supple & Spry
skillTree.description: This one’s writhing form can slowly caress and tease, but also move like lightning when required, knocking a projectile from the air or batting it back at the foe.

skillTree.name: Paradise of Pleasure
skillTree.description: As the Perfect Prince's dark influence increases, so too do the blessings of His pleasure.

skillTree.name: Voice of the Dark Gods
skillTree.description: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.

skillTree.name: Hearts of Iron
skillTree.description: The followers of Chaos need not to rest, they march on with iron hearts desperate to harvest souls.

skillTree.name: Unmatched Beauty
skillTree.description: Beneath flax-fine hair and a crown of lacquered horns sit eyes full of innocence; and yet they are cruel, calculating and without pity.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -4 for "Phantasmagoria Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Drive for Perfection
skillTree.description: To supplicate the Damned Prince is not only to worship him, but to follow in his immaculate footsteps.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for embedded Heroes
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Impeccable Taste
skillTree.description: Fine silks bedecked with alluring jewels of malevolent magic empower this statuesque form.

skillTree.name: Serpent's Kiss
skillTree.description: Long and delicate, Azazel’s double-headed tail suspends with graceful movements, belying its potential to lacerate with extreme violence.

skillTree.name: Ecstatic Adoration
skillTree.description:
“…From the day You were Chosen
	All wrongdoing found You,
	Filled with lawlessness and sin,
	Yet perfect in Your ways…”

skillTree.name: Paradise Found
skillTree.description: One cannot experience the greatest pleasures without first experiencing the greatest pains.

effects.description:
Path to Glory: -25% Souls cost to upgrade characters to a Daemon Prince of Slaanesh
	(all characters)

Path to Glory: -25% Souls cost to devote to Slaanesh
	(all characters)

skillTree.name: Rapid Ruination
skillTree.description: Swift flashes of an agile form and razor-sharp blades are all this Daemon Lord's victims see of him, but by then it's already far, far too late.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Lash of Slaanesh"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Lash of Slaanesh Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Lash of Slaanesh Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Acquiescence Upgraded"

ui_effects.description: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Pavane of Slaanesh"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Pavane of Slaanesh Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Pavane of Slaanesh Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Hysterical Frenzy"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Hysterical Frenzy Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Hysterical Frenzy Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Slicing Shards"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Slicing Shards Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Slicing Shards Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Phantasmagoria Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.name: Dominating Presence
skillTree.description: A Chaos Lord dominates – lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Chaos Vanguard
skillTree.description: To the Northmen, there is no greater honour than to fight and perish under the gaze of the Gods.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for all non-Daemonic infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for all non-Daemonic infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for all non-Daemonic infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for all non-Daemonic infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for all non-Daemonic infantry units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Savage Bloodlust
skillTree.description: The Daemons of Chaos bay for blood, spurred on by a chorus of agonised screams.

effects.description:
Armour: +4 for all Daemonic melee units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +8 for all Daemonic melee units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +8 for all Daemonic melee units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for all Daemonic melee units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for all Daemonic melee units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Warp Fire
skillTree.description: As dark wings take to the skies and Daemon arrows bear down, the enemies of Chaos know their end is near.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +4 for all Daemonic missile and flying units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +4% for all Daemonic flying units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for all Daemonic missile and flying units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for all Daemonic missile units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +6% for all Daemonic flying units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +8 for all Daemonic missile and flying units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for all Daemonic missile units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hammer into Anvil
skillTree.description: Breaking bones and ending lives, the armies of Chaos strike like an unholy hammer crashing through their enemies' ranks.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +6 for all non-Daemonic cavalry and chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for all non-Daemonic cavalry and chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +6 for all non-Daemonic cavalry and chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +8 for all non-Daemonic cavalry and chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for all non-Daemonic cavalry and chariot units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Monstrous Strength
skillTree.description: Hulks of pure muscle, held upright by unsullied hatred, can crush a man with a frightening lack of effort.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +4% for all non-Daemonic war beasts, monstrous and monster units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +6% for all non-Daemonic war beasts, monstrous and monster units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for all non-Daemonic war beasts, monstrous, and monster units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for all non-Daemonic war beasts, monstrous and monster units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for all non-Daemonic war beasts, monstrous, and monster units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Doomfire
skillTree.description: Subdue the enemy with savage fire, as flaming projectiles burn a trail across the sky.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +10% for all non-Daemonic missile cavalry and artillery units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +15% for all non-Daemonic missile cavalry and artillery units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for all non-Daemonic missile cavalry and artillery units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for all non-Daemonic missile cavalry and artillery units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for all non-Daemonic missile cavalry and artillery units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Legion of Doom
skillTree.description: The legions march forth under the Lord's inscrutable gaze, eager to kill for fear of his wrath.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for all infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for all infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 20% for all infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Speed & Malice
skillTree.description: The worthiest of Chaos' vanguard are blessed with the most elaborate mutations, which also enable them to move faster for longer.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for all cavalry, chariots and flying units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for all cavalry, chariots and flying units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for all cavalry, chariots and flying units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Freakish Mutations
skillTree.description: Mutations awarded by the Chaos Gods to their followers may look horrific to southerners, but such gifts are prized.

effects.description:
Leadership: +8 for all war beasts, monstrous and monster units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for all war beasts, monstrous, and monster units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: 5% for all war beasts, monstrous and monster units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Malevolent Ranger
skillTree.description: To devastate one's enemies from afar is the key to controlling the battlefield.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for all missile units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for all missile units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for all missile units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Despoilers
skillTree.description: To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.

skillTree.name: Serve or Die
skillTree.description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

effects.description: Warband upgrades cost: -5% for all units
Warband upgrades cost: -10% for all units

skillTree.name: Devoted of Chaos
skillTree.description: No act of faith can rival reaving the souls of the slain; a dark and twisted offering in honour of the Ruinous Powers.

effects.description:
Increased experience gain: +10% for units when fighting against the Forces of Order
	(Lord's army)

Increased experience gain: +15% for units when fighting against the Forces of Order
	(Lord's army)

Increased experience gain: +20% for units when fighting against the Forces of Order
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Ruination
skillTree.description: "This stinking mortal Hold will fall, my masters have foreseen it. Bring them ruin!"

effects.description:
Attrition suffered by defender: +5% when laying siege or encircling
	(local region)

Attrition suffered by defender: +10% when laying siege or encircling
	(local region)

Attrition suffered by defender: +15% when laying siege or encircling
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Unholy Resilience
skillTree.description: This willing servant of the Ruinous Powers has a resilience that is beyond any mortal measure.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Foetid Gallipot
skillTree.description: A pungent mix of fell unguents ensures the unholy vitality of one’s minions.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Blessed by Evil
skillTree.description: For one fighting with the favour of the Ruinous Powers, glory and riches come naturally.

effects.description:
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +5%
	(Lord's army)

Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Premonition
skillTree.description: Visions cloud the mind, prophesising the arrival of the enemy and uncovering every shadow in which they lurk.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +20%

skillTree.name: Dark Seducer
skillTree.description: Few could resist such sultry wiles, drawing so many to corruption's insidious grasp.

backgroundSkills.name: Prince of Damnation
backgroundSkills.description: From a warm, silvery voice comes whispers telling the foe of pleasures that could be theirs, if only they submit to the waiting arms of Slaanesh.

ui_effects.description: Effect intensity increases by each enemy unit in range with leadership wavering or lower.

effects.description: Seduce Units cost: -20% for Empire, Bretonnia, Kislev and Cathay units

items.name: Daemonblade
items.description: Fashioned by Slaanesh himself, Azazel's devilish sword strikes with a hellish force that even enchanted armour simply cannot deflect.
